raw: * The method scrolls the element into view (x-axis only).
* @param element {Element} DOM element to scroll into view
* @param stop {Element?null} Any parent element which functions as
*   outermost element to scroll. Default is the HTML document.
* @param align {String?null} Alignment of the element. Allowed values:
* left or right. Could also be null.
*   Without a given alignment the method tries to scroll the widget
*   with the minimum effort needed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The method scrolls the element into view (x-axis only).

@param.body: element {Element} DOM element to scroll into view
@param.description: DOM element to scroll into view

stop {Element?null} Any parent element which functions as

@param.name: @param

@param.description: Alignment of the element. Allowed values: left or right. Could also be null. Without a given alignment the method tries to scroll the widget with the minimum effort needed.

raw: * The method scrolls the element into view.

* left or right. Could also be undefined.
*   Without a given alignment the method tries to scroll the widget
*   with the minimum effort needed.

* top or bottom. Could also be undefined.
*   Without a given alignment the method tries to scroll the widget
*   with the minimum effort needed.

Any parent element which functions as
   outermost element to scroll. Default is the HTML document.
